### Source[rayvista package](https://github.com/h-a-graham/rayvista)
### Source[jet propulsion Laboratory NASA](https://photojournal.jpl.nasa.gov/mission/Terra?start=600)
```{r}
#devtools::install_github("h-a-graham/rayvista", dependencies=TRUE)

library(rayshader) 
library(rayvista)
library(rayrender)


attu <- plot_3d_vista(lat = 52.8763, long = 172.8905, 
                      zscale = 5, zoom = 0.5,
                      overlay_detail = 14, 
                      theta = -65, 
                      windowsize = 1000, 
                      phi = 25)


render_snapshot("Attu_Alaska.png", clear = TRUE)
```
